paper_abstract: The main theorem of this article gives a classification of the codewords in C-n-1(perpendicular to)(n, q), the dual code of points and hyperplanes in PG(n, q), q even, with weight smaller than q + (3)root q(2) + 1. In the proof, we rely on the classification of the small blocking sets in PG(2, q), q even.
paper_title: Small weight codewords in the dual code of points and hyperplanes in PG(n, q), q even
